title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.16 - Disclosure to consultants, advisory committees, State and local government officials and other special government employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 838.16 - Disclosure to consultants, advisory committees, State and local government officials and other special government employees

State Regulations

Data and information otherwise exempt from public
disclosure may be disclosed to commission consultants, advisory committees, State and local government officials, and other special government employees
for use only in their work in cooperation with the commission. Such persons are
thereafter subject to the same restrictions with respect to the disclosure of
such data and information as any other commission employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
838.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
